column5: Hi All,  I just wanted to know if there were any other OFNCers attending the Ducks Unlimited Dinner event in Richmond Hill tonight? I was a late invite but plan to be there.  If you're there, please look for me and say "hello". I'm the 6 ft, a bit overweight Chinese Guy with the orange shirt in the mid 30's.  Stan  ** I hope I'm not pinning myself for some knocks!! Haha **
